name: VR Flight for Google Cardboard Virtual Reality
name_original: VR Flight for Google Cardboard Virtual Reality
description:
Fly an airplane around a beautiful VR environment in 3D virtual reality right on your smartphone! Tilt your head to control the plane. This game is for Google Cardboard and other VR mobile virtual reality headsets.


Use your virtual reality headset to explore an amazing HD world while controlling an airplane.


Features:
-Stereoscopic virtual reality rendering and headtracking for mobile VR
-Beautiful large environment with lots of areas to go to


Learn more about Google Cardboard here:
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/

Works with any mobile stereoscopic headset with a built in accelerometer.

Some Compatible VR ( Virtual Reality ) Headsets Include:
Google Cardboard
FIBRUM
Stooksy
Durovis Dive VR
Merge VR
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru VR
